resources.string:
Welcome to TourBoston, a test application designed to practice the following android programming concepts: 
 
 - Designing layouts + views 
 		(list views, fragments, tab layouts, view pager 
 		 drawer layouts + navigation views, 'including' layouts, 
 		 recycler views, toolbars + collapsing toolbars, 
 		 app bars, coordinator layout, card views, 
 		 nested scroll views, and floating action buttons) 
 
 - Intents 
 		 (switching activities, 
 		 opening another app to complete an action) 
 
 - Dealing with fragments (view pager + nav drawer)
 
 - Efficiently structuring code
